item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

make it look like this, then add it to item.java

[code]public static int randombarrowschest[] = {MY ITEMS};

public static int randombarrowschest()
{
return randombarrowsitem[(int)(Math.random()*randombarrowschest.length)];
}[/code]

then your action code would look like this…

else if(useItemID == 276 && atObjectID == 10284)// Barrows chest addItem(Item.randombarrowitem(), 1); { sendMessage("You unlock the chest with the key and get a reward!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

not sure about client but on mine it refers to item.java - item3.java

this is in item.java

[code]public static int herbs[] = {249,249,249,249,249,249,251,251,251,251251,253,253,253,253,255,255,255,255,257,257,257,259,259,259,261,261,261,263,263,263,265,265,267,267,269,269};

public static int randomHerb()
{
return herbs[(int)(Math.random()*herbs.length)];
}[/code]

and this for the action

if((objectID == 4677) || (objectID == 4678) || (objectID == 4679) || (objectID == 4675)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(827); addItem(Item.randomHerb(), 1); } }
